meanings.def: a set of rooms, especially in a hotel
examples: She booked a hotel suite overlooking Central Park.
Add some honey to make it sweet.
Suck this sweet—it might soothe your throat.
a family suite of two interconnecting rooms

meanings.def: a set of matching pieces of furniture
examples: (British English) a three-piece suite with two armchairs and a sofa

meanings.def: a piece of music made up of three or more related parts, for example pieces from an opera
a set of related computer programs
examples: a suite of software development tools
